createBookingTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bookings (bookingId VARCHAR(50) not NULL, checkInDate VARCHAR(255), checkOutDate VARCHAR(255), hotelName VARCHAR(50), noOfGuests INTEGER, bookingReference VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY ( bookingId ))
insertBooking: INSERT INTO bookings(bookingId, checkInDate, checkOutDate, hotelName, noOfGuests) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)
